scripts.biome:check: pnpm lint && pnpm check && pnpm format
scripts.biome:apply: pnpm lint:apply && pnpm check:apply && pnpm format:apply
scripts.build:git: git add . && git commit -m "Build v$npm_package_version" && git push
scripts.build:preview: pnpm biome:apply && pnpm build:version && pnpm build:ts && pnpm build:js
scripts.build:version: node-jq -r '.version=$ARGS.positional[0]+"+"+$ARGS.positional[1]+"-"+$ARGS.positional[2]' package.json --args "$(pnpm -s env:semver)" "$(git rev-parse --short head)" "$(date +%s)" | sponge package.json
scripts.push: pnpm build && {pnpm tag || printf "";} && gh-pages -t -m "Deploy v$(pnpm -s env:version)" -d dist
scripts.tag: git tag isp-site-v$(pnpm -s env:semver) && git push origin isp-site-v$(pnpm -s env:semver)
